properties.areaDesc: Northern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Eastern Clinton; Western Clinton; Northern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin
properties.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued January 11 at 3:03AM EST until January 12 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Burlington VT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy freezing rain with significant icing expected.
Total ice accumulations of a half inch to one inch expected,
with the highest amounts expected in the Saint Lawrence Valley
of New York.

* WHERE...Northern and western St. Lawrence, Clinton, and
northern Franklin Counties in New York.

* WHEN...Rain will change to freezing rain tonight and continue
into Sunday morning. Freezing rain will be moderate to heavy at
times. Precipitation will end as a brief period of snow Sunday
afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Expect power outages and tree damage due to the ice.
Travel could be very difficult Saturday night into Sunday
owing to icy roads.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty southwest winds 25 to 35 mph will
develop Sunday afternoon, which will have an impact on any ice
laden trees and powerlines.
properties.instruction:
Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. Prepare for
extended power outages.

Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

NWSheadline: ICE STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST SUNDAY
